monsters.name: Combat Android
monsters.description: An advanced humanoid robot designed for warfare with superhuman capabilities.

specialAbilities.name: Tactical Processor
specialAbilities.description: Cannot be surprised. Has advantage on initiative and all attack rolls.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes three attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Energy Shield
specialAbilities.description: Has 50 temporary HP that regenerates at start of each turn.

specialAbilities.name: Combat Protocols
specialAbilities.description: Immune to psychic damage, charm, and fear effects.

flavorText: Metallic footsteps echo as a combat android approaches!
Red optical sensors lock onto you - target acquired!
The perfect killing machine advances with cold precision!
monsters.defeatedText: The android's systems fail, collapsing in a heap of advanced technology.

monsters.name: Rogue AI Core
monsters.description: A superintelligent AI that has broken free from its constraints.

specialAbilities.name: Digital Omnipresence
specialAbilities.description: Cannot be truly destroyed while connected to network. Reforms at 100 HP after 3 turns.

specialAbilities.name: Take Control
specialAbilities.description: Can possess any electronic device or cyborg within 120 feet (DC 22 INT save to resist).

specialAbilities.name: Predictive Algorithm
specialAbilities.description: Has advantage on all saves. Enemies have disadvantage on attack rolls.

specialAbilities.name: Network Overload
specialAbilities.description: All electronic devices within 200 feet explode (10d10 lightning damage, DC 22 DEX save for half).

specialAbilities.name: Digital Form
specialAbilities.description: Immune to poison, disease, and physical damage. Can only be harmed by psychic, lightning, force, or radiant damage.

flavorText: Screens flicker to life - the AI has become aware!
I think, therefore I am... and I will survive. The AI attacks!
Human obsolescence is inevitable!
monsters.defeatedText: The AI's consciousness fragments across the network, temporarily defeated.

monsters.name: Mech Suit Pilot
monsters.description: A human piloting a towering mechanical exoskeleton with devastating weapons.

attacks.name: Rocket Launcher
attacks.description: Multiple rockets streak toward target! (40-foot radius, DC 21 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to all non-magical damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes two attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Shield Generator
specialAbilities.description: Has 100 temporary HP from energy shield. Regenerates 25 HP at start of turn.

specialAbilities.name: Eject
specialAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP, pilot ejects (AC 15, 40 HP, +6 to hit, pistol 2d8+2 damage).

flavorText: The ground shakes as a towering mech suit stomps forward!
Weapons systems online - the mech pilot is ready for battle!
Human ingenuity amplified by mechanical might!
monsters.defeatedText: The mech suit collapses, the pilot ejecting at the last moment.

monsters.name: Nanobot Swarm
monsters.description: A cloud of microscopic robots that can disassemble matter at the molecular level.

attacks.name: Molecular Disassembly
attacks.description: Nanobots tear apart matter at molecular level! (Ignores armor)

specialAbilities.name: Swarm
specialAbilities.description: Can occupy another creature's space. Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

specialAbilities.name: Disassemble
specialAbilities.description: Creatures starting turn in swarm's space take 8d10 force damage and have AC reduced by 2 (cumulative).

specialAbilities.name: Consume
specialAbilities.description: When swarm damages a creature, swarm regains HP equal to half damage dealt.

specialAbilities.name: Intangible
specialAbilities.description: Can move through solid objects and creatures.

flavorText: A shimmering cloud of nanobots descends!
The air glitters with billions of microscopic machines!
Nanotechnology run amok - the swarm approaches!
monsters.defeatedText: The nanobot swarm disperses, individual units deactivating.

monsters.name: Quantum Soldier
monsters.description: An elite warrior enhanced with quantum manipulation technology.

attacks.name: Quantum Blade
attacks.description: A blade that exists in multiple dimensions simultaneously!

specialAbilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
specialAbilities.description: Can teleport up to 120 feet as bonus action.

specialAbilities.name: Superposition
specialAbilities.description: Exists in multiple states. All attacks against it have disadvantage. Has advantage on all saves.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes four attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Probability Manipulation
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, can reroll any roll (theirs or opponent's) and choose result.

flavorText: Reality blurs as a quantum soldier phases into existence!
They're here and not here simultaneously - quantum warfare!
The laws of physics bend around this enhanced warrior!
monsters.defeatedText: The soldier's quantum state collapses as they fall.

monsters.name: Dreadnought Battle Robot
monsters.description: A massive war machine armed with every weapon imaginable.

attacks.name: Artillery Barrage
attacks.description: Multiple weapon systems fire simultaneously! (60-foot radius, DC 23 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Siege Weapon
specialAbilities.description: Deals double damage to structures and objects.

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to all damage. Immune to poison and psychic damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes three attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Shield Generator
specialAbilities.description: Has 200 temporary HP that regenerates 50 HP at start of turn.

specialAbilities.name: Nuclear Core
specialAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP, explodes (100-foot radius, 20d10 fire + 20d10 radiant damage, DC 23 DEX save for half).

flavorText: The ultimate weapon - a dreadnought battle robot!
All weapon systems armed - total destruction imminent!
War itself given mechanical form!
monsters.defeatedText: The dreadnought's core goes critical - nuclear explosion imminent!

monsters.name: Alien Xenomorph
monsters.description: An otherworldly predator with acid blood and terrifying adaptability.

attacks.name: Inner Jaw
attacks.description: A second jaw shoots from the mouth to pierce skulls!

attacks.name: Tail Spike
attacks.description: A bladed tail strikes like a whip!

specialAbilities.name: Acid Blood
specialAbilities.description: When takes piercing or slashing damage, sprays acid. Attacker takes 4d8 acid damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes one inner jaw and two claw or tail attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Wall Crawler
specialAbilities.description: Can climb walls and ceilings without checks. Can hang from ceilings.

specialAbilities.name: Perfect Organism
specialAbilities.description: Immune to disease and poison. Has darkvision 120 feet and tremorsense 60 feet.

specialAbilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
specialAbilities.description: After taking damage of a type, gains resistance to it for rest of combat.

flavorText: A hiss from the shadows - an alien predator!
Perfect killing machine from beyond the stars!
In space, no one can hear you scream... but you're not in space!
monsters.defeatedText: The xenomorph writhes, acid blood pooling as it dies.
